mapper.select: INSERT INTO success_group_buyings (group_buying_id, user_id, group_buying_at, state) VALUES (#{groupBuyingId}, #{userId}, #{groupBuyingAt}, 0) RETURNING id;

SELECT sg.id, sg.user_id, sg.group_buying_id, sg.state, sg.group_buying_at, sg.verification_code, sg.exchange_time, sg.created_at, gb.id "groupBuying.id", gb.merchat_id "groupBuying.merchat_id", gb.name "groupBuying.name", gb.logo "groupBuying.logo", gb.describe "groupBuying.describe", gb.integral "groupBuying.integral", gb.examine "groupBuying.examine", gb.publish "groupBuying.publish", gb.images "groupBuying.images", gb."limit" "groupBuying.limit", gb.total "groupBuying.total", gb.remain "groupBuying.remain", gb.start_time "groupBuying.start_time", gb.end_time "groupBuying.end_time", gb.created_at "groupBuying.created_at" FROM success_group_buyings AS sg INNER JOIN group_buyings AS gb ON sg.group_buying_id = gb.id WHERE sg.id = #{id};

SELECT sg.id, sg.user_id, sg.group_buying_id, sg.state, sg.group_buying_at, sg.verification_code, sg.exchange_time, sg.created_at, gb.id "groupBuying.id", gb.merchat_id "groupBuying.merchat_id", gb.name "groupBuying.name", gb.logo "groupBuying.logo", gb.describe "groupBuying.describe", gb.integral "groupBuying.integral", gb.examine "groupBuying.examine", gb.publish "groupBuying.publish", gb.images "groupBuying.images", gb.total "groupBuying.total", gb.remain "groupBuying.remain", gb.start_time "groupBuying.start_time", gb.end_time "groupBuying.end_time", gb.created_at "groupBuying.created_at" FROM success_group_buyings AS sg INNER JOIN group_buyings AS gb ON sg.group_buying_id = gb.id WHERE sg.user_id = #{userId};
